|pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=C5 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN7020 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=M25P32V6G |fla2=4 GiB |fla2_brand=Micron |fla2_model=MTFC4GMDEA-1M WT |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16HA-125:E |ram1_num=4 |ram2=512 |ram2_brand=Micron |ram2_model=MT41K256M8DA-107 |ram2_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 (Type A) |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, J21 |serial=yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Vitesse |eth_chip2_model=VSC8514 |eth_chip3_brand=Vitesse |eth_chip3_model=VSC8501 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=GPS Module;Telit;Jupiter SE880;;1;,,, CPLD;Altera;EPM1270F265C5N;;1;,,, USB to Basic UART IC;FTDI;FT230X;;1;,,, I2C TPM Device;Renesas;R5H30211;;1;,,, 2K Serial EEPROM;STMicro;24C02WP;;1;,,, I2C RTC w/SRAM;Microchip;MPC7940N;;1;,,, 500mA Low Dropout Regulator;TI;LM2937;;2;,,, System Temperature Monitor;ON Semi;ADM1032;;1;,,, 3.7A 100V N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDT3612;;1;,,, 512 Kbit serial I2C bus EEPROM;STMicro;M24512-R;;2;,,, 4-bit Low-Voltage FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CB3Q3257;;1;,,, 1.5A Adjustable LDO Linear Regulator;TI;LP38852-ADJ;;1;,,, 13W Single POE Controller;Linear Technology;LTC4274C;;1;,,, 52A 100V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AOD2908;;1;,,, Octal Buffer or Driver w/ 3-State Output;TI;SN74LVC244A;;1;,,, Octal Bus Transceiver w/3-State Output;TI;SN74AUCH245;;2;,,, Complementary Power Darlington Transistor;STMicro;MJD122;;1;,,, Dual N-Channel Logic Level PWM MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6898A;;4;,,, Dual Channel High Speed Logic Gate Optocoupler;Fairchild;HCPL-2631;;2;,,, Integrated 3A Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3823;;1;,,, N-Channel MOSFET Synchronous Buck Regulator Controller;National Semi;LM2743;;4; |flags=GPS receiver, RTC w/ battery, PoE out, heatsink, fan, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.07;; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.62;-ltsi; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=80:B7:09 }} {{TagLine|SD-WAN Router}} :[https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/routers/sdwan/vedge/hardware/vEdge-routers-hardware-installation-guide/vEdge-routers-hardware-installation-guide_chapter_01.html Installation Guide] * [https://interfacemasters.com/pdf/appliances/Niagara820-ProductBrief.pdf OEM Datasheet]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN7020 Dual-core [[MIPS64]] (@800MHz) *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 4MB SPI Flash, 4GB eMMC Flash *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports, 1 w/802.3af PoE *USB: 1x USB 3.0 host port *Power: 12V, 1.5A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Viptela vEdge 100-AC Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Viptela vEdge 100-AC Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Viptela vEdge 100-AC GPS Board.jpeg|GPS Board File:Viptela vEdge 100-AC Internal view.jpeg|Internal View </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
